smartwatch.context.common.superclasses

Class CommonClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartwatch.context.common.superclasses.CommonClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AverageMeasuresClass, LocalizationClass, MeasureClass

    public abstract class CommonClass
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class CommonClass unifies methods and attributes used by LocalizationClass, MeasureClass and AverageMeasuresClass. It thereby offers access to the database, progressDialogs and the activity using the classes itself.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected android.app.Activity activity
      The Activity attribute holds a reference to the initiating activity.
      protected DatabaseHelper db
      The Db instance managing all information for measurements and averages.
      protected android.app.ProgressDialog progress
      The ProgressDialog object to give the user visual feedback on progress.
      protected android.net.wifi.WifiManager wifiManager
      The Wifi manager object holding functionality to check WiFi Access Points in the environment of the user.

    • Field Detail

      • activity

        protected android.app.Activity activity
        The Activity attribute holds a reference to the initiating activity. With the help of this variable, ProgressDialogs can be shown in the activity's context.

        The Db instance managing all information for measurements and averages.

        The ProgressDialog object to give the user visual feedback on progress.

        The Wifi manager object holding functionality to check WiFi Access Points in the environment of the user.
